title: Hang pinching, or The good fellowes observation, mongst a ioviall crew, of them that hate flinching, but is alwayes true blew To the tune of Drive the cold winter away.
author: Blunden, William.
publisher: for Thomas Lambert at the sign of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield,
notes: Signed at end: W.B., i.e. William Blunden.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
